note: Students facing study mares regarding their studies, in the subjects of mathematics, physics and computers don't have to worry anymore. StudyMare - Not Anymore, is a sincere effort to help all such students understand the concepts, fundamentals and the basics, with the help of relevant examples, along with the exercises. We don't aim at just providing the solutions, rather focus at making them learn the tips and tricks, understand the procedure, and enhance their problem solving skills.
